title: Ale

properties.name: description
properties.value: Ales are a category of brewed drinks, usually obtained from bars, pubs and inns across the world or brewed by players themselves. Most ales restore a little health, but also provide a few temporary boosts to skills, while they also have a drawback on others, usually Attack, Strength and Defence, which should be considered before they are drunk.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ale
See also: Brewing
 This article or section is incomplete and could do with improvement.
Reason: Several of the negative boosting effects are incorrect
You can discuss this issue on the talk page or edit this article to improve it.

Ales are a category of brewed drinks, usually obtained from bars, pubs and inns across the world or brewed by players themselves. Most ales restore a little health, but also provide a few temporary boosts to skills, while they also have a drawback on others, usually Attack, Strength and Defence, which should be considered before they are drunk.
